skill.description: Generate conversion-optimized page copy using VOC research, competitor insights, and proven structures. Use when creating or revising landing pages, service pages, or marketing content.

skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill that provides copywriting guidelines and structure templates. It contains no executable code, network calls, or file system access - only markdown documentation with writing principles and banned phrases.

content.user_title: Write High-Converting Marketing Copy That Sells
content.value_statement: Most marketing copy fails because it uses jargon and makes unverifiable claims. This skill generates conversion-optimized copy using real customer voice and verified business claims.
actual_capabilities: Generates homepage copy with proven 7-section structure
Creates services pages with detailed descriptions and pricing
Writes About pages with credentials verification
Replaces jargon with plain language automatically
Ensures 95%+ uniqueness score for all content
Cross-references claims against business consistency data
limitations: Requires VOC research data for authentic customer voice
Needs business consistency master for claim verification
Cannot generate copy without verified business information

use_cases.title: Create client landing pages
use_cases.description: Generate complete homepage copy that converts visitors into leads using proven structures and verified claims

use_cases.title: Rewrite service descriptions
use_cases.description: Transform boring service pages into compelling copy that speaks customer language and builds trust

use_cases.title: Scale content production
use_cases.description: Quickly generate multiple page variations while maintaining quality and avoiding duplicate content

prompt_templates.title: Homepage Hero Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a homepage hero section for [business type] that addresses [customer pain point] using conversational tone and includes a clear value proposition

prompt_templates.title: Services Overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a services overview section that lists 3-5 core services for [business] with brief descriptions that focus on benefits, not features

prompt_templates.title: Social Proof Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a proof section with 2-3 testimonials and key statistics that demonstrate results for [business type] customers

prompt_templates.title: FAQ Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 5-7 FAQ questions and answers based on real customer objections and concerns about [product/service]

output_examples.input: Create homepage copy for a local plumbing company
output: Hero: 'Burst pipe at 2am? We'll be there in 30 minutes - guaranteed.'
Problem: 'Plumbing emergencies don't wait for business hours.'
Value Props: '24/7 response, licensed plumbers, upfront pricing'
Process: 'Call ‚Üí Get ETA ‚Üí Fix ‚Üí Pay fair price'
FAQ: 'What areas do you serve? How much for emergency calls?'
CTA: 'Save our number now - before you need it'

best_practices: Always use real customer quotes from VOC research for authentic voice
Verify every claim against business consistency master before publishing
Test different variations and measure conversion rates to optimize
anti_patterns: Never use banned jargon words like 'leverage', 'synergy', or 'cutting-edge'
Don't make claims without verification sources - always link to proof
Avoid generic templates - each business needs unique positioning

faq.answer: No word limits, but maintains quality with 95%+ uniqueness and verified claims
